title: TradeTrendAI
description: Using LSTM model we build a website that can predict trend of 150+ equities publicly traded on Nepal Stock Exchange.

features.title: Intuitive Dashboard
features.description: Interactive Dashboard to display the historic and predicted prices with easy to use interface.

features.title: Real Data
features.description: Financial, Broker , historic CandleStick Data were used to train the LSTM Model.

features.title: Fundamental and Technical Metrics
features.description: Availability of important fundamental and technical metrics.

title: OrderViz
description: A real-time data pipeline that scrapes order book data from a TMS website using Selenium, processes it using Apache Kafka and Apache Spark, stores it in Cassandra, and streams it to a React frontend through a WebSocket backend.

features.title: Real-Time Data Scraping
features.description: Using Selenium with ChromeDriver to scrape order book data from a TMS website every second, sending it through a WebSocket in real time.

features.title: Data Streaming with Kafka
features.description: Data is passed from the Selenium WebSocket producer to two Kafka consumers (stock and indices data) for further processing.

features.title: Data Aggregation with Apache Spark
features.description: The stock data is aggregated using Apache Spark and stored in a Cassandra database for efficient querying and retrieval.

features.title: Real-Time Data Delivery
features.description: The final processed data is streamed to a React frontend via a WebSocket backend, allowing users to view live updates of the order book.

features.title: Containerization with Docker
features.description: All components are containerized using Docker, ensuring portability and ease of deployment across environments.

title: BlogNation
description: A blog platform where you can signup as an author and express your views on any topic.

features.title: Rich Text Editing
features.description: Create and format blog posts with ease using an intuitive Quill-based editor.

features.title: Post Interaction
features.description: Users can view, comment on, and interact with blog posts, fostering a vibrant community.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for all devices, providing a smooth user experience on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
